Longview Farms near Castleton, Ontario

Longview Farms has been in the McKague family for over a century. From the original 50 acres, it has been increased several times over the years. It now includes the farm where Lena McGregor (Mrs. John B. McKague) spent much of her early life. The original McKague farm and the McGregor farm were sites of two of the first three telephones in the area. Longview is still farmed by McKagues today. Please let us know if you can add any photos to our family archive. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
